__e: Barbara,I know what you've been doing.
- I think I'll see if the girls are alright...
- I... there was... there was an animal or something!
Barbara and I are pregnant. We know how you feel.
Just come with me. But you can't sleep over... because Barbara and I...
You know, barbara and I weren't always like this.
Barbara's name is in here somewhere.
All barbara says is that he had "other things to do. "
It was on a night like this that Barbara died.
Barbara, if you see to the food, I'll get the fire going.
Do you think we stand a chance of getting out of here?
You say Barbara rescued you. Did she do that for you? Or for herself?
Ma'am, excuse me. Am I late for Barbara Jean's plane?
Barbara Jean said he brought shame to the town posing for that magazine.
Here, this is just somethin'... somethin' that Barbara Jean told me to pick up for you.
You must believe what Barbara did try and understand my dear and why she did it!
Yes, I think Barbara's quite right, my dear.
It's Barbara. Barbara says what Barbara wants. There's nothing I can do about it.
